home.title: Discover Chinese Taoist Temples
home.subtitle: Explore the Taoist culture that has been passed down for thousands of years
home.feature1Desc: Comprehensive information about temples across China, including addresses, contact details, and historical backgrounds
home.feature2Desc: Real reviews from actual visitors to help you understand the true situation of temples
home.feature3Desc: Provide Taoist classics and knowledge articles to inherit and promote Taoist culture
home.feature4Desc: Support multi-condition search and filtering to quickly find temples of interest

classics.title: Taoist Classics
classics.selectClassic: Select a classic to view details

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.selectArticle: Select an article to view details

about.title: About Us
about.mission1Desc: Dedicated to inheriting and promoting Taoist culture, allowing more people to understand Taoist philosophy
about.mission2Desc: Provide a convenient platform for believers and culture enthusiasts to query and communicate about temples
about.mission3Desc: Promote communication and cooperation between temples in different regions for common development
about.supportDesc: If you like our platform, welcome to support our work in the following ways

login.title: Admin Login
login.loginFailed: Login failed, please check your username and password

admin.manageTemples: Add, edit, and delete temple information

footer.aboutDesc: Taoist Temple Directory is a comprehensive platform dedicated to promoting and inheriting Taoist culture, gathering information about temples across China.
